Config.Categorize.Title: Categorize chests
Config.CraftFromChest.Title: Craft from chests
Config.CraftFromChest.desc: Use items from nearby chests to craft.
Config.StashToChests.Title: Stash to chests
Config.StashToChests.desc: Stash items to chests using a hot key.
Config.StashToNearby.Title: Stash to nearby
Config.StashToNearby.desc: Allows for items to be stashed to chests in the player's vicinity.
Config.StashAnywhere.Title: Stash from anywhere
Config.StashAnywhere.desc: Allows for items to be stashed to any chest accessible to the player.
Config.KeyBind.Title: Key bind
Config.StashRule.LockItems.desc: Prevent tools from stash into chests, may useful in multiplayer.
Config.Mobile.Title: Mobile adaptation
Config.Mobile.Offset.desc: Adjust the offset of buttons besides the inventory menus on mobile devices.
LockItems.Title: Lock items
